title: Nachtmann Vivino Champagne Glass, 4 Count (Pack of 1), Clear
features: Vivino is a new supreme crystal collection from Nachtmann, the lifestyle division of Riedel glassworks, developed with Durability, Functionality and Sustainability in mind
These glasses are inspired by our most successful foodservice stemware lines, of which millions of glasses have been sold to restaurants and hotels worldwide
The glasses have proven to withstand extreme daily use and are dishwasher safe
Drawing upon all the knowledge of the Riedel family, the 4 Vivino shapes are perfect to improve the wine experience for their different namesake wine varieties
description: Vivino is a new supreme crystal collection from Nachtmann, the lifestyle division of Riedel glassworks, developed with Durability, Functionality and Sustainability in mind!  These glasses are inspired by our most successful foodservice stemware lines, of which millions of glasses have been sold to restaurants and hotels worldwide.  The glasses have proven to withstand extreme daily use and are dishwasher safe! Drawing upon all the knowledge of the Riedel family, the 4 Vivino shapes are perfect to improve the wine experience for their different namesake wine varieties.  A crystal wine glass is by definition already a sustainable product as it is made for use over many years, the opposite of glasses made from plastic or polycarbonate.  Vivino is produced in our Amberg factory, where we follow strict worldwide regulations for industrial production regarding protecting our environment and using as few resources as possible.  Our glasses are fully recyclable and are ISO certified for implementing systems and standards for environment and quality management. Durable. Functional. Sustainable. Dishwasher safe. Improve wine enjoyment
